appetizers.name: Zaalouk
instructions: Grill the eggplants until charred and soft.
Peel and chop the eggplants and tomatoes.
In a pan, heat the olive oil and sauté the garlic.
Add the tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add the eggplants, spices, salt, and pepper.
Cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

appetizers.name: Moroccan Harira
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight.
Cook chickpeas and lentils until tender.
In a pot, heat the olive oil and sauté the onion and garlic.
Add the tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add the spices, chickpeas, lentils, and rice.
Cook for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

mainDishes.name: Chicken Tagine with Olives and Preserved Lemons
instructions: In a tagine, heat the olive oil and sauté the garlic.
Add the chicken pieces and brown on all sides.
Add the spices, preserved lemons, and olives.
Cover and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

mainDishes.name: Lamb Couscous
instructions: In a pot, heat the olive oil and sauté the onion and garlic.
Add the lamb pieces and brown on all sides.
Add the spices and vegetables.
Cover and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Prepare the couscous according to the package instructions.
Serve the lamb and vegetables over the couscous.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

desserts.name: Moroccan Almond Briouats
instructions: Mix ground almonds, sugar, honey, and cinnamon.
Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter.
Place a spoonful of almond mixture at the end of each strip.
Fold the phyllo dough into triangles, enclosing the filling.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes, or until golden brown.

desserts.name: Chebakia
instructions: Mix flour, sesame seeds, honey, orange blossom water, and cinnamon.
Knead the dough until smooth.
Roll out the dough and cut into strips.
Shape the strips into flower shapes.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

beverages.name: Moroccan Mint Tea
instructions: Place the mint, green tea bag, and sugar in a teapot.
Pour boiling water over the ingredients.
Let steep for 5 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with additional mint leaves.

beverages.name: Orange Juice with Blossom Water
instructions: Juice the oranges.
Mix the orange juice, orange blossom water, and sugar.
Serve over ice cubes.
